displayName.text: K & W Best Dry Cleaner & Laundry Inc.

formattedAddress: 229 E 11th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: K & W Best Dry Cleaner & Laundry

adrFormatAddress: 229 E 11th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: I’m changing my review from 5 ⭐️. The owner / worker deceives you with their pricing. They change the weight of the laundry bag you give them. I found a 5 pound difference which came out to be a $6.5 difference. I’ve been giving them my laundry for over 3 years now and never checked but clearly honesty is lost in NY. They advertise Free Pick and Delivery but are lie about the weight to make up for the pick up. That’s inappropriate and I’d recommend going to another laundromat.

originalText.text: Lost 13 shirts that I had asked to get dry cleaned. When I called, the man over the phone changed his story 2-3 times on whether or not they had picked them up and tried to deny the fact that I had called for pick up.

text.text: Lost 13 shirts that I had asked to get dry cleaned. When I called, the man over the phone changed his story 2-3 times on whether or not they had picked them up and tried to deny the fact that I had called for pick up.

originalText.text: The owner, which is the only employee working in this spot, can't handle his responsibilities. He forgets to wash your clothes and, for people like me who need the service for business, you lose as well. Rules changes every week, he never answers his cell phone — afraid of the customer of course, and the professionalism word never was understood in this store. It's not about money but how all types of companies have to do at least the minimum: respect.

originalText.text: Quick turnaround, great service, competitive prices. Owner and employees are communicative and kind. Would not go anywhere else. I live nearby so have never done delivery, but my roommate has and was very satisfied with the service. Would definitely recommend
